snippet.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 ULTIMATE - EXTENDED TRAILER
snippet.description:
"Like" us on Facebook: http://facebook.com/tecmoeurope
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/tecmokoeieurope

DEAD OR ALIVE 5 ULTIMATE heightens the signature DOA fighting style with the inclusion of new modes from DOA5 Plus, dynamic new stages, and deadly new fighters to deliver the ultimate in fighting entertainment. Players will take on the roles of their favourite DEAD OR ALIVE fighters—as well as combatants new to the franchise—in an intense, action-packed brawler set in visually striking locations from around the world. The famed DOA hand-to-hand combat is enhanced with new content that extends the experience. Along with an array of single-player modes including story mode, DEAD OR ALIVE 5 ULTIMATE offers online options with arcade-style matches, tournaments, and rich social features.
